text: Waga shirushi no kyokkai-sha wa, ware kara kakure rarenai. Hi goku ni nagekoma reru mono to naru no ga yoi no ka, soretomo shinpan no hi ni anshin shite ko rareru mono to naru no ga yoi no ka. Anata gata ga konomu tori ni okonai nasai. Hontoni kare wa, anata gata no okonau koto o mimamora reru
